Sentencas: An optimal structural design model of residential power and heat supply devices (R-PHDs), including cogeneration and heat pump units, was developed by considering their operational and capital recovery constraints.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: The structure of R-PHDs with peripheral devices, sizes of energy storage devices, and their multi-period operation were determined so as to minimize annual primary energy consumption.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: In addition to various operational constraints for a cogeneration unit and a battery unit, an operable hours constraint and daily selection of outlet water temperature were newly formulated for heat pump units.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: The capital recovery by reducing energy cost was also considered in order to select R-PHDs that have high energy-saving effects but are presently expensive.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: The developed model took the form of a mixed-integer linear programming problem.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: The model was applied to the structural design of R-PHDs, whose candidates are three types of cogeneration units (gas engine, polymer electrolyte fuel cell, and solid oxide fuel cell), heat pump unit, storage tank, battery unit, and peripheral devices.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: The result revealed a trade-off between energy savings and initial cost in the optimal structures.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints

Sentencas: A sensitivity analysis of the initial costs of expensive devices was also carried out to clarify their initial cost targets.
Titulo: Optimal structural design of residential power and heat supply devices in consideration of operational and capital recovery constraints
